sentences: Several Parties stressed the need to promote capacity building, technology transfer and reporting as measures to support synergies.
FAO reported on its activities relating to agriculture, energy, and rural development, and IUCN highlighted the need to integrate climate change measures into protected areas management.
Chair Thorgeirsson said Outi Berghäll (Finland) and Marcela Maim (Chile) would conduct informal consultations on draft SBSTA conclusions.
enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
